articles.description: The Riddle Sawdust Jubilee is at risk of cancellation due to low volunteer turnout and funding. Organizers urge the community to step up, donate, or volunteer to help save this cherished tradition. Let’s work together to keep the Jubilee alive for future generations.

articles.description: Two people were killed and several members of the UCC softball team injured in a head-on crash on OR 42 in Coos County. A van carrying 10 players was struck by a pickup that crossed the centerline. Impaired driving is suspected. The crash is under investigation.
articles.title: Tragedy on OR 42: UCC Softball Team Involved in Fatal Crash
